Providence.Louis Kotzow House: The Louis Kotzow House is a historic house at 641 East Avenue in Pawtucket, Rhode Island. It is a 1-1/2 story wood frame structure, laid out in an L shape. Its exterior is visually busy, with numerous projecting dormer and gable sections, and elaborate woodwork, including bracketed eaves and applied Stick style woodwork on a projecting bay section.
